verses.verse: How blessed<WH835> are those whose way<WH1870> is blameless,<WH8549> Who walk<WH1980> in the law<WH8451> of the Lord.<WH3068>
How blessed<WH835> are those who observe<WH5341> His testimonies,<WH9381> Who seek<WH1875> Him with all<WH3605> [their] heart.<WH3820>
They also<WH637> do<WH6466> no<WH3808> unrighteousness;<WH9390> They walk<WH1980> in His ways.<WH1870>
Thou hast ordained<WH6680> Thy precepts,<WH6490> That we should keep<WH8104> [them] diligently.<WH3966>
Oh<WH305> that my ways<WH1870> may be established<WH3559> To keep<WH8104> Thy statutes!<WH2706>
Then<WH227> I shall not be ashamed<WH954> When I look<WH5027> upon all<WH3605> Thy commandments.<WH4687>
I shall give<WH3034> thanks<WH3034> to Thee with uprightness<WH3476> of heart,<WH3824> When I learn<WH3925> Thy righteous<WH6664> judgments.<WH4941>
I shall keep<WH8104> Thy statutes;<WH2706> Do not forsake<WH5800> me utterly<WH5704>!<WH3966>
How<WH4100> can a young<WH5288> man<WH5288> keep<WH2135> his way<WH734> pure<WH2135>? By keeping<WH8104> [it] according to Thy word.<WH1647>
With all<WH3605> my heart<WH3820> I have sought<WH1875> Thee; Do not let me wander<WH7686> from Thy commandments.<WH4687>
Thy word<WH565> I have treasured<WH6845> in my heart,<WH3820> That I may not sin<WH2398> against Thee.
Blessed<WH1288> art Thou, O Lord;<WH3068> Teach<WH3925> me Thy statutes.<WH2706>
With my lips<WH8193> I have told<WH5608> of All<WH3605> the ordinances<WH4941> of Thy mouth.<WH6310>
I have rejoiced<WH7797> in the way<WH1870> of Thy testimonies,<WH5715> As much<WH5921> as in all<WH3605> riches.<WH1952>
I will meditate<WH7878> on Thy precepts,<WH6490> And regard<WH5027> Thy ways.<WH734>
I shall delight<WH8173> in Thy statutes;<WH2708> I shall not forget<WH7911> Thy word.<WH1697>
Deal<WH1580> bountifully<WH1580> with Thy servant,<WH5650> That I may live<WH2421> and keep<WH8104> Thy word.<WH1697>
Open<WH1540> my eyes,<WH5869> that I may behold<WH5027> Wonderful<WH6381> things<WH6381> from Thy law.<WH8451>
I am a stranger<WH1616> in the earth;<WH776> Do not hide<WH5641> Thy commandments<WH4687> from me.
My soul<WH5315> is crushed<WH1638> with longing<WH8375> After<WH413> Thine ordinances<WH4941> at all<WH3605> times.<WH6256>
Thou dost rebuke<WH1605> the arrogant,<WH2086> the cursed,<WH779> Who wander<WH7686> from Thy commandments.<WH4687>
Take<WH1556> away<WH1556> reproach<WH2781> and contempt<WH937> from me, For I observe<WH5341> Thy testimonies.<WH9381>
Even<WH1571> though princes<WH8269> sit<WH3427> and talk<WH1696> against me, Thy servant<WH5650> meditates<WH7878> on Thy statutes.<WH2706>
Thy testimonies<WH9381> also<WH1571> are my delight;<WH8191> [They are] my counselors.<WH376> <WH6098>
My soul<WH5315> cleaves<WH1692> to the dust;<WH6083> Revive<WH2421> me according to Thy word.<WH1697>
I have told<WH5608> of my ways,<WH1870> and Thou hast answered<WH6030> me; Teach<WH3925> me Thy statutes.<WH2706>
Make me understand<WH995> the way<WH1870> of Thy precepts,<WH6490> So I will meditate<WH7878> on Thy wonders.<WH6381>
My soul<WH5315> weeps<WH1811> because<WH4480> of grief;<WH8424> Strengthen<WH6965> me according to Thy word.<WH1697>
Remove<WH5493> the false<WH8267> way<WH1870> from me, And graciously<WH2603> grant<WH2603> me Thy law.<WH8451>
I have chosen<WH977> the faithful<WH530> way;<WH1870> I have placed<WH9586> Thine ordinances<WH4941> [before me.]
I cleave<WH1692> to Thy testimonies;<WH5715> O Lord,<WH3068> do not put<WH954> me to shame!<WH954>
I shall run<WH7323> the way<WH1870> of Thy commandments,<WH4687> For Thou wilt enlarge<WH7337> my heart.<WH3820>
Teach<WH3384> me, O Lord,<WH3068> the way<WH1870> of Thy statutes,<WH2706> And I shall observe<WH5341> it to the end.<WH6118>
Give<WH995> me understanding,<WH995> that I may observe<WH5341> Thy law,<WH8451> And keep<WH8104> it with all<WH3605> [my] heart.<WH3820>
Make me walk<WH1869> in the path<WH5410> of Thy commandments,<WH4687> For I delight<WH2654> in it.
Incline<WH5186> my heart<WH3820> to Thy testimonies,<WH5715> And not to [dishonest] gain.<WH1215>
Turn<WH5674> away<WH5674> my eyes<WH5869> from looking<WH7200> at vanity,<WH7723> And revive<WH2421> me in Thy ways.<WH1870>
Establish<WH6965> Thy word<WH565> to Thy servant,<WH5650> As that which<WH834> produces reverence<WH3374> for Thee.
Turn<WH5674> away<WH5674> my reproach<WH2781> which<WH834> I dread,<WH3025> For Thine ordinances<WH4941> are good.<WH2896>
Behold,<WH2009> I long<WH8373> for Thy precepts;<WH6490> Revive<WH2421> me through Thy righteousness.<WH6666>
May Thy lovingkindnesses<WH2617> also come<WH935> to me, O Lord,<WH3068> Thy salvation<WH8668> according to Thy word;<WH565>
So I shall have<WH6030> an answer<WH6030> <WH1697> for him who reproaches<WH2778> me, For I trust<WH982> in Thy word.<WH1697>
And do not take<WH5337> the word<WH1697> of truth<WH571> utterly<WH5704> <WH3966> out of my mouth,<WH6310> For I wait<WH3176> for Thine ordinances.<WH4941>
So I will keep<WH8104> Thy law<WH8451> continually,<WH8548> Forever<WH5769> and ever.<WH5703>
And I will walk<WH1980> at liberty,<WH7342> For I seek<WH1875> Thy precepts.<WH6490>
I will also speak<WH1696> of Thy testimonies<WH9381> before<WH5048> kings,<WH4428> And shall not be ashamed.<WH954>
And I shall delight<WH8173> in Thy commandments,<WH4687> Which<WH834> I love.<WH157>
And I shall lift<WH5375> up my hands<WH3709> to Thy commandments,<WH4687> Which<WH834> I love;<WH157> And I will meditate<WH7878> on Thy statutes.<WH2706>
Remember<WH2142> the word<WH1697> to Thy servant,<WH5650> In which<WH834> Thou hast made me hope.<WH3176>
This<WH384> is my comfort<WH5165> in my affliction,<WH6040> That Thy word<WH565> has revived<WH2421> me.
The arrogant<WH2086> utterly<WH5704> <WH3966> deride<WH9238> me, [Yet] I do not turn<WH5186> aside<WH5186> from Thy law.<WH8451>
I have remembered<WH2142> Thine ordinances<WH4941> from of old,<WH5769> O Lord,<WH3068> And comfort<WH5162> myself.
Burning<WH2152> indignation<WH2152> has seized<WH270> me because<WH4480> of the wicked,<WH7563> Who forsake<WH5800> Thy law.<WH8451>
Thy statutes<WH2706> are my songs<WH2158> In the house<WH1004> of my pilgrimage.<WH4033>
O Lord,<WH3068> I remember<WH2142> Thy name<WH8034> in the night,<WH3915> And keep<WH8104> Thy law.<WH8451>
This<WH384> has become<WH1961> mine, That I observe<WH5341> Thy precepts.<WH6490>
The Lord<WH3068> is my portion;<WH2506> I have promised<WH559> to keep<WH8104> Thy words.<WH1697>
I entreated<WH9134> Thy favor<WH6440> with all<WH3605> [my] heart;<WH3820> Be gracious<WH2603> to me according to Thy word.<WH565>
I considered<WH2803> my ways,<WH1870> And turned<WH7725> my feet<WH7272> to Thy testimonies.<WH9381>
I hastened<WH2363> and did not delay<WH4102> To keep<WH8104> Thy commandments.<WH4687>
The cords<WH9112> of the wicked<WH7563> have encircled<WH9388> me, [But] I have not forgotten<WH7911> Thy law.<WH8451>
At midnight<WH2676> <WH3915> I shall rise<WH6965> to give<WH3034> thanks<WH3034> to Thee Because<WH5921> of Thy righteous<WH6664> ordinances.<WH4941>
I am a companion<WH2270> of all<WH3605> those who<WH834> fear<WH3372> Thee, And of those who keep<WH8104> Thy precepts.<WH6490>
The earth<WH776> is full<WH4390> of Thy lovingkindness,<WH2617> O Lord;<WH3068> Teach<WH3925> me Thy statutes.<WH2706>
Thou hast dealt<WH6213> well<WH9185> with Thy servant,<WH5650> O Lord,<WH3068> according to Thy word.<WH1697>
Teach<WH3925> me good<WH2898> discernment<WH2940> and knowledge,<WH1847> For I believe<WH539> in Thy commandments.<WH4687>
Before<WH2962> I was afflicted<WH6031> I went<WH7683> astray,<WH7683> But now<WH6258> I keep<WH8104> Thy word.<WH565>
Thou art good<WH2896> and doest<WH3190> good;<WH3190> Teach<WH3925> me Thy statutes.<WH2706>
The arrogant<WH2086> have forged<WH2950> a lie<WH8267> against<WH5921> me; With all<WH3605> [my] heart<WH3820> I will observe<WH5341> Thy precepts.<WH6490>
Their heart<WH3820> is covered<WH2954> with fat,<WH2459> [But] I delight<WH8173> in Thy law.<WH8451>
It is good<WH2895> for me that I was afflicted,<WH6031> That I may learn<WH3925> Thy statutes.<WH2706>
The law<WH8451> of Thy mouth<WH6310> is better<WH2896> to me Than<WH4480> thousands<WH505> of gold<WH2091> and silver<WH3701> [pieces].
Thy hands<WH3027> made<WH6213> me and fashioned<WH3559> me; Give<WH995> me understanding,<WH995> that I may learn<WH3925> Thy commandments.<WH4687>
May those who fear<WH3372> Thee see<WH7200> me and be glad,<WH8055> Because<WH3588> I wait<WH3176> for Thy word.<WH1697>
I know,<WH3045> O Lord,<WH3068> that Thy judgments<WH4941> are righteous,<WH6664> And that in faithfulness<WH530> Thou hast afflicted<WH6031> me.
O<WH4994> may<WH4994> Thy lovingkindness<WH2617> comfort<WH5162> me, According to Thy word<WH565> to Thy servant.<WH5650>
May Thy compassion<WH7356> come<WH935> to me that I may live,<WH2421> For Thy law<WH8451> is my delight.<WH8191>
May the arrogant<WH2086> be ashamed,<WH954> for they subvert<WH5791> me with a lie;<WH8267> [But] I shall meditate<WH7878> on Thy precepts.<WH6490>
May those who fear<WH3372> Thee turn<WH7725> to me, Even those who know<WH3045> Thy testimonies.<WH9381>
May my heart<WH3820> be blameless<WH8549> in Thy statutes,<WH2706> That I may not be ashamed.<WH954>
My soul<WH5315> languishes<WH3615> for Thy salvation;<WH8668> I wait<WH3176> for Thy word.<WH1697>
My eyes<WH5869> fail<WH3615> [with longing] for Thy word,<WH565> While I say,<WH559> "When<WH4970> wilt Thou comfort<WH5162> me?"
Though<WH3588> I have become<WH1961> like a wineskin<WH4997> in the smoke,<WH7008> I do not forget<WH7911> Thy statutes.<WH2706>
How<WH4100> many<WH4100> are the days<WH3117> of Thy servant<WH5650>? When<WH4970> wilt Thou execute<WH6213> judgment<WH4941> on those who persecute<WH7291> me?
The arrogant<WH2086> have dug<WH3738> pits<WH7882> for me, [Men] who<WH834> are not in accord with Thy law.<WH8451>
All<WH3605> Thy commandments<WH4687> are faithful;<WH530> They have persecuted<WH7291> me with a lie;<WH8267> help<WH5826> me!
They almost<WH4592> destroyed<WH3615> me on earth,<WH776> But as for me, I did not forsake<WH5800> Thy precepts.<WH6490>
Revive<WH2421> me according to Thy lovingkindness,<WH2617> So that I may keep<WH8104> the testimony<WH5715> of Thy mouth.<WH6310>
Forever,<WH5769> O Lord,<WH3068> Thy word<WH1697> is settled<WH5324> in heaven.<WH8064>
Thy faithfulness<WH530> [continues] throughout all<WH1755> generations;<WH1755> Thou didst establish<WH3559> the earth,<WH776> and it stands.<WH5975>
They stand<WH5975> this day<WH3117> according to Thine ordinances,<WH4941> For all<WH3605> things<WH3605> are Thy servants.<WH5650>
If<WH3884> Thy law<WH8451> had not been my delight,<WH8191> Then<WH227> I would have perished in my affliction.<WH6>
I will never<WH5769> <WH3808> forget<WH7911> Thy precepts,<WH6490> For by them Thou hast revived<WH2421> me.
I am Thine, save<WH3467> me; For I have sought<WH1875> Thy precepts.<WH6490>
The wicked<WH7563> wait<WH6960> for me to destroy me; I shall diligently<WH6> consider<WH995> Thy testimonies.<WH995>
I have seen<WH7200> a limit<WH7093> to all<WH3605> perfection;<WH8502> Thy commandment<WH4687> is exceedingly<WH3966> broad.<WH7342>
O how<WH4100> I love<WH157> Thy law!<WH8451> It is my meditation<WH7881> all<WH3605> the day.<WH3117>
Thy commandments<WH4687> make<WH2449> me wiser<WH2449> than<WH4480> my enemies,<WH340> For they are ever<WH5769> mine.
I have more<WH4480> insight<WH7919> than<WH4480> all<WH3605> my teachers,<WH3925> For Thy testimonies<WH5715> are my meditation.<WH7881>
I understand<WH995> more<WH4480> than<WH4480> the aged,<WH2205> Because<WH3588> I have observed<WH5341> Thy precepts.<WH6490>
I have restrained<WH3607> my feet<WH7272> from every<WH3605> evil<WH9563> way,<WH734> That I may keep<WH8104> Thy word.<WH1697>
I have not turned<WH5493> aside<WH5493> from Thine ordinances,<WH4941> For Thou Thyself<WH859> hast taught<WH3384> me.
How<WH4100> sweet<WH4452> are Thy words<WH565> to my taste!<WH2441> [Yes, sweeter] than<WH4480> honey<WH1706> to my mouth!<WH6310>
From Thy precepts<WH6490> I get<WH995> understanding;<WH995> Therefore<WH5921> <WH3651> I hate<WH8130> every<WH3605> false<WH8267> way.<WH734>
Thy word<WH1697> is a lamp<WH5216> to my feet,<WH7272> And a light<WH216> to my path.<WH9350>
I have sworn,<WH7650> and I will confirm<WH6965> it, That I will keep<WH8104> Thy righteous<WH6664> ordinances.<WH4941>
I am exceedingly<WH5704> <WH3966> afflicted;<WH6031> Revive<WH2421> me, O Lord,<WH3068> according to Thy word.<WH1697>
O<WH4994> accept<WH7521> the freewill<WH5071> offerings<WH5071> of my mouth,<WH6310> O Lord,<WH3068> And teach<WH3925> me Thine ordinances.<WH4941>
My life<WH5315> is continually<WH8548> in my hand,<WH3709> Yet I do not forget<WH7911> Thy law.<WH8451>
The wicked<WH7563> have laid<WH5414> a snare<WH6341> for me, Yet I have not gone<WH8582> astray<WH8582> from Thy precepts.<WH6490>
I have inherited<WH5157> Thy testimonies<WH5715> forever,<WH5769> For they are the joy<WH8342> of my heart.<WH3820>
I have inclined<WH5186> my heart<WH3820> to perform<WH6213> Thy statutes<WH2706> Forever,<WH5769> [even] to the end.<WH6118>
I hate<WH8130> those who<WH5588> are double-minded, But I love<WH157> Thy law.<WH8451>
Thou art my hiding<WH5643> place<WH5643> and my shield;<WH4043> I wait<WH3176> for Thy word.<WH1697>
Depart<WH5493> from me, evildoers,<WH7489> That I may observe<WH5341> the commandments<WH4687> of my God.<WH430>
Sustain<WH5564> me according to Thy word,<WH565> that I may live;<WH2421> And do not let me be ashamed<WH954> of my hope.<WH7664>
Uphold<WH5582> me that I may be safe,<WH3467> That I may have<WH8159> regard<WH8159> for Thy statutes<WH2706> continually.<WH8548>
Thou hast rejected<WH9364> all<WH3605> those who wander<WH7686> from Thy statutes,<WH2706> For their deceitfulness<WH9652> is useless.<WH8267>
Thou hast removed<WH7673> all<WH3605> the wicked<WH7563> of the earth<WH776> [like] dross;<WH5509> Therefore<WH3651> I love<WH157> Thy testimonies.<WH9381>
My flesh<WH1320> trembles<WH5568> for fear<WH6343> of Thee, And I am afraid<WH3372> of Thy judgments.<WH4941>
I have done<WH6213> justice<WH4941> and righteousness;<WH6664> Do not leave<WH5117> me to my oppressors.<WH6231>
Be surety<WH6148> for Thy servant<WH5650> for good;<WH9185> Do not let the arrogant<WH2086> oppress<WH6231> me.
My eyes<WH5869> fail<WH3615> [with longing] for Thy salvation,<WH3444> And for Thy righteous<WH6664> word.<WH565>
Deal<WH6213> with Thy servant<WH5650> according to Thy lovingkindness,<WH2617> And teach<WH3925> me Thy statutes.<WH2706>
I am Thy servant;<WH5650> give<WH995> me understanding,<WH995> That I may know<WH3045> Thy testimonies.<WH9381>
It is time<WH6256> for the Lord<WH3068> to act,<WH6213> [For] they have broken<WH6565> Thy law.<WH8451>
Therefore<WH5921> <WH3651> I love<WH157> Thy commandments<WH4687> Above<WH4480> gold,<WH2091> yes, above<WH4480> fine<WH6337> gold.<WH6337>
Therefore<WH5921> <WH3651> I esteem<WH3474> right<WH3474> all<WH3605> [Thy] precepts<WH6490> concerning everything,<WH3605> I hate<WH8130> every<WH3605> false<WH8267> way.<WH734>
Thy testimonies<WH5715> are wonderful;<WH6382> Therefore<WH5921> <WH3651> my soul<WH5315> observes<WH5341> them.
The unfolding<WH6608> of Thy words<WH1697> gives<WH215> light;<WH215> It gives<WH995> understanding<WH995> to the simple.<WH6612>
I opened<WH6473> my mouth<WH6310> wide<WH6473> and panted,<WH7602> For I longed<WH2968> for Thy commandments.<WH4687>
Turn<WH6437> to me and be gracious<WH2603> to me, After Thy manner<WH4941> with those who love<WH157> Thy name.<WH8034>
Establish<WH3559> my footsteps<WH6471> in Thy word,<WH565> And do not let any<WH3605> iniquity<WH205> have<WH7980> dominion<WH7980> over me.
Redeem<WH6299> me from the oppression<WH6233> of man,<WH120> That I may keep<WH8104> Thy precepts.<WH6490>
Make Thy face<WH6440> shine<WH215> upon Thy servant,<WH5650> And teach<WH3925> me Thy statutes.<WH2706>
My eyes<WH5869> shed<WH3381> streams<WH6388> of water,<WH4325> Because<WH5921> they do not keep<WH8104> Thy law.<WH8451>
Righteous<WH6662> art Thou, O Lord,<WH3068> And upright<WH3477> are Thy judgments.<WH4941>
Thou hast commanded<WH6680> Thy testimonies<WH9381> in righteousness<WH6664> And exceeding<WH3966> faithfulness.<WH530>
My zeal<WH7068> has consumed<WH6789> me, Because<WH3588> my adversaries<WH6862> have forgotten<WH7911> Thy words.<WH1697>
Thy word<WH565> is very<WH3966> pure,<WH6884> Therefore Thy servant<WH5650> loves<WH157> it.
I am small<WH6810> and despised,<WH959> [Yet] I do not forget<WH7911> Thy precepts.<WH6490>
Thy righteousness<WH6666> is an everlasting<WH5769> righteousness,<WH6664> And Thy law<WH8451> is truth.<WH571>
Trouble<WH9496> and anguish<WH4689> have come<WH4672> upon me; [Yet] Thy commandments<WH4687> are my delight.<WH8191>
Thy testimonies<WH5715> are righteous<WH6664> forever;<WH5769> Give<WH995> me understanding<WH995> that I may live.<WH2421>
I cried<WH7121> with all<WH3605> my heart;<WH3820> answer<WH6030> me, O Lord!<WH3068> I will observe<WH5341> Thy statutes.<WH2706>
I cried<WH7121> to Thee; save<WH3467> me, And I shall keep<WH8104> Thy testimonies.<WH9381>
I rise<WH6923> before dawn<WH5399> and cry<WH7768> for help;<WH7768> I wait<WH3176> for Thy words.<WH1697>
My eyes<WH5869> anticipate<WH6923> the night watches,<WH821> That I may meditate<WH7878> on Thy word.<WH565>
Hear<WH8085> my voice<WH6963> according to Thy lovingkindness;<WH2617> Revive<WH2421> me, O Lord,<WH3068> according to Thine ordinances.<WH4941>
Those who follow<WH7291> after wickedness<WH2154> draw<WH7126> near;<WH7126> They are far<WH7368> from Thy law.<WH8451>
Thou art near,<WH7138> O Lord,<WH3068> And all<WH3605> Thy commandments<WH4687> are truth.<WH571>
Of old<WH6924> I have known<WH3045> from Thy testimonies,<WH9381> That Thou hast founded<WH3245> them forever.<WH5769>
Look<WH7200> upon my affliction<WH6040> and rescue<WH2502> me, For I do not forget<WH7911> Thy law.<WH8451>
Plead<WH7378> my cause<WH7379> and redeem<WH1350> me; Revive<WH2421> me according to Thy word.<WH565>
Salvation<WH3444> is far<WH7350> from the wicked,<WH7563> For they do not seek<WH1875> Thy statutes.<WH2706>
Great<WH7227> are Thy mercies,<WH7356> O Lord;<WH3068> Revive<WH2421> me according to Thine ordinances.<WH4941>
Many<WH7227> are my persecutors<WH7291> and my adversaries,<WH6862> [Yet] I do not turn<WH5186> aside<WH5186> from Thy testimonies.<WH5715>
I behold<WH7200> the treacherous<WH898> and loathe<WH6962> [them], Because<WH834> they do not keep<WH8104> Thy word.<WH565>
Consider<WH7200> how<WH3588> I love<WH157> Thy precepts;<WH6490> Revive<WH2421> me, O Lord,<WH3068> according to Thy lovingkindness.<WH2617>
The sum<WH7218> of Thy word<WH1697> is truth,<WH571> And every<WH3605> one<WH3605> of Thy righteous<WH6664> ordinances<WH4941> is everlasting.<WH5769>
Princes<WH8269> persecute<WH7291> me without<WH2600> cause,<WH2600> But my heart<WH3820> stands<WH6342> in awe<WH6342> of Thy words.<WH1697>
I rejoice<WH7797> at Thy word,<WH565> As one who finds<WH4672> great<WH7227> spoil.<WH7998>
I hate<WH8130> and despise<WH8581> falsehood,<WH8267> [But] I love<WH157> Thy law.<WH8451>
Seven<WH7651> times<WH7651> a day<WH3117> I praise<WH1984> Thee, Because<WH5921> of Thy righteous<WH6664> ordinances.<WH4941>
Those who love<WH157> Thy law<WH8451> have great<WH7227> peace,<WH7965> And nothing<WH369> causes them to stumble.<WH4383>
I hope<WH7663> for Thy salvation,<WH3444> O Lord,<WH3068> And do<WH6213> Thy commandments.<WH4687>
My soul<WH5315> keeps<WH8104> Thy testimonies,<WH9381> And I love<WH157> them exceedingly.<WH3966>
I keep<WH8104> Thy precepts<WH6490> and Thy testimonies,<WH9381> For all<WH3605> my ways<WH1870> are before<WH5048> Thee.
Let my cry<WH7440> come<WH7126> before<WH6440> Thee, O Lord;<WH3068> Give<WH995> me understanding<WH995> according to Thy word.<WH1697>
Let my supplication<WH8467> come<WH935> before<WH6440> Thee; Deliver<WH5337> me according to Thy word.<WH565>
Let my lips<WH8193> utter<WH5042> praise,<WH8416> For Thou dost teach<WH3925> me Thy statutes.<WH2706>
Let my tongue<WH3956> sing<WH9420> of Thy word,<WH565> For all<WH3605> Thy commandments<WH4687> are righteousness.<WH6664>
Let Thy hand<WH3027> be ready to help<WH5826> me, For I have chosen<WH977> Thy precepts.<WH6490>
I long<WH8373> for Thy salvation,<WH3444> O Lord,<WH3068> And Thy law<WH8451> is my delight.<WH8191>
Let my soul<WH5315> live<WH2421> that it may praise<WH1984> Thee, And let Thine ordinances<WH4941> help<WH5826> me.
I have gone<WH8582> astray<WH8582> like a lost sheep;<WH6> seek<WH7716> Thy servant,<WH1245> For I do not forget<WH5650> Thy commandments.<WH7911>
